name: Stadium's "Spicy Feast" Backed Chair
description: A stone chair with armrests and backrests that can be found in the Stadium of the Sacred Flame. At first, these chairs were designed to provide temporary rest for competitors, commentators, and judges. As such, artisans specially selected stones with excellent heat dissipation properties to provide a cooling sensation to those exhausted after their labors. However, people would incidentally discover that this unique "cool sitting sensation" could also alleviate the heat from having eaten spicy food. Thus did these chairs become popular in various food stalls as well. That said, while spicy food is delicious indeed, do remember to consume in moderation...
